overview: Focusing on a middle class family in present day Taipei, each of the family members experiences struggles and sparks of change happening their own daily lives. While unable to share their inner emotions, they could still read between the lines, and sense that there are something yet to be said. In the family, Jia-Shiang, Jia-Chi, the Father, and the Mother, all have their individual ‘homework’ to be solved.
title: Homework
